name: Artica For Postfix & Zarafa
short_description:
Artica is able to manage Postfix And zarafa using an Open LDAP database.

This project is an ISO that able to install a full Zarafa server without any technical skills.

The Web console is a "sexy" web interface developped in Ajax.

With the Artica Web console you will be able to manage users, groups, companies and mail routing with postfix.

All postfix features are available trough the Artica web interface including :

    Multiple postfix instances: Each Zarafa organization can manage it's own "virtual" MTA trough their account.
    PostScreen support : PostScreen is the next Anti-spam developped by the Postfix funder.
    Greylisting support.
    Content filtering support trough Spamassassin and amavisd-new.
    All routing systems : by user, domain, IP ....

Additional features has :
    Full MTA queues management : Display mail in queue, VIP features (notify admin when some specifics mails stay in queue.)
summary: Debian ISO 32/64 bits that transform a Zarafa system on a "full" mail
